App Name : AZ Health Monitor

 Version : 2.0

 Author : Abhishek Zambre, Mayank Khullar

 Website : abhiz.me

 Class : Master of Computer Science (MCS), Arizona State University

 Description : Extension to v1.0 with addition to Network and Database Connectivity.

 Light sensor from v1.0 is replaced with Accelerometer sensor.

 Added 3 new buttons. Save creates a new database, starts sensor, and inserts values in table. Upload will upload database file to the server. Download will download database file from server and will display contents of it on Graph and Text Fields.
